short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track analytics calls on a website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get to know how often a website you are surfing is tracking you and your actions.

How it works -
As soon as a call to analytics is made a notification pops up and counter would increment.

Analytics covered -

*Google Analytics
*Yahoo Analytics
*Google Tag Manager
*Doubleclick
*Facebook
